backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing subscription management with Stripe integration, user profiles, brand voice profiles, content generation requests, and tier-based feature access control with admin authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state to new state by adding customerId field to UserSubscription records while preserving all other data structures.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three Stripe integration features: setup page for API keys, checkout initiation from pricing page, and subscription management with customer portal access.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-sentence summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration files for the content generation platform.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script loading main.tsx for the Viral Growth Operating System application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for landing, pricing, dashboard, subscription, content generator, payment callbacks, and Stripe setup, wrapped in theme provider with toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ContentOutput.ts: Component rendering generated content sections (hooks, scripts, captions, hashtags, monetization angles, scores, etc.) with tier-based feature gating and upgrade prompts for locked features.
frontend/src/components/ContentScoreCard: Displays AI-powered content performance metrics (hook strength, retention potential, monetization potential) with progress bars and color-coded scores, plus a virality analysis explanation.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main application layout component with sticky header, navigation (desktop/mobile), authentication state handling, and footer with legal links and social media.
Displays a legal notice alert explaining user rights to generated content, AI limitations, and compliance responsibilities.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal dialog that prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and email, blocking interaction until profile is created.
frontend/src/components/UpgradePrompt.ts: Card component that displays a locked feature message and prompts users to upgrade to Pro or Elite tier with a link to pricing page.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication state and initializing access control with optional admin token.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: React Query hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing identity state and AuthClient lifecycle with delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for backend operations including user profiles, subscriptions, feature sets, content generation requests, Stripe checkout, and admin functions with mock fallback data for content generation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, energetic color palette for light and dark modes, including primary coral-orange colors, chart colors, and sidebar theming.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication context.
frontend/src/pages/ContentGenerator.tsx: Content generation page with a form for users to input content strategy parameters (tone, audience, platform, niche, goal) and display AI-generated content results.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard displaying subscription status, tier-based features, and content request history with navigation to content generation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page showcasing the AI content generation platform with hero section, feature cards, and call-to-action buttons for authentication and pricing.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailure.tsx: Payment cancellation confirmation page with options to retry payment or return to dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccess.tsx: Payment success confirmation page that invalidates subscription cache and provides navigation to dashboard or content generation.
frontend/src/pages/PricingPage.tsx: Pricing page displaying three subscription tiers (Free, Pro, Elite) with feature comparisons and Stripe checkout integration for paid plans.
frontend/src/pages/StripeSetup.tsx: Admin-only page for configuring Stripe API credentials (secret key and allowed countries) with authentication checks, form validation, and success/error feedback.
frontend/src/pages/SubscriptionManagemen: User subscription management page displaying current plan tier, status, billing cycle, and upgrade options with tier-based UI styling and external Stripe billing portal integration.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for cross-navigation persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color system using OKLCH, typography, container settings, custom shadows, animations, and design tokens for the UI component library.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining an AI-powered SaaS platform for content creators with tiered subscriptions (Free/Pro/Elite), architectural notes on payment processing, copyright compliance, and existing implemented features.
